long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text-form is a super simple, easy to use way of changing the look of webpages. The main focus is to make webpages easier or more enjoyable to read, without overcomplicating things.

You can easily set:
    -background colour
    -text colour
    -text font
    -text weight
    -text size

Preferences are automatically saved, and the extension can be instantly switched on and off, to restore the default look of any page when needed.
